divs: Sighting DetailsOn christmas eve i was sleeping on the couch by the tree and i put a $50 gift certificate in it there were two others for my brothers and one for me, i fell asleep all doors and window were locked and i was the only one in the house, i awoke from my sleep but still half awake and i saw 1 little grey alien and 3 men in black walk stright threw the patio door yet this door was a glass door that was broken so it was boarded up and could not be opened they walked straight threw it. i recognized them as the alien and MIB and telepathically i heard the notice me that i was waking up the alien looked at me and then they all turned into people i recognize like family so i then just paseed it off and went back to sleep, in the morniong the gift certificat that was addressed to me was missing i searched the entire hose and found nothing yet the ones for my brothers were still there. I feel the aliens are watching me and manipulating the events of my life to achieve thier goals for what ever reason i dont know
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Port Alberni
There were no other sightings in Port Alberni on or around December 25th 2005
Summary: Grey alien and men in black walk threw wall
